text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the AllergyIntolerance uuid field for the AllergyIntolerance record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/AllergyIntolerance?_id={uuid}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the AllergyIntolerance uuid field for the AllergyIntolerance record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/AllergyIntolerance?_id={uuid}
